column5: This is a comfortable bedroom with a full sized bed in quiet Lochwood neighborhood in Northeast Dallas, near Garland, Texas. Full private bathroom. Full kitchen and laundry access. Dallas Area Rapid Transit (DART) rail is 7 minute drive and DART bus stop is a half block away. Bus to downtown in 45-60 minutes.  Lochwood is near restaurants and bars. Lower Greenville & Knox-Henderson are a 10 minute drive. Deep Ellum, Uptown, downtown (Dallas Arts District) are 15-20 minute drive.
